name: woodblock
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a piece of wood on which a pattern is cut that is used for printing: She designs her own fabrics using woodblocks and stencils to create patterns on the material.
Johannes Geyer/GettyImages
UK one of a set of small, flat pieces of wood that are used to make a wooden floor: a woodblock floor See also
parquet
